duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive business through sales strategies, clienteling, sourcing new customers and maintaining ongoing productive relationships with customers.
Maintain a clean and tidy selling floor at all times and complete daily operational tasks including maintaining store (sales floor and backroom), cash wrap, and visual merchandising.
Understand changes in the local market with potential impact on business performance and support the execution of local sales strategies and tactics.
Process customer transactions: Purchase, Return, Exchange, Found Order etc.
Provide in-depth product knowledge, including features, benefits, current offerings, and overall product value.
Represent the brand as a brand ambassador and create positive impressions with customers by bringing the best self to work through attire consistent with the company's guide to style.
Develop short- and long-term strategies to achieve personal metrics and performance goals, taking ownership of personal survey results and creating plans to improve and overcome areas of opportunity.
Leverage company's tools and technology to support relationship building and clienteling efforts.
Promote and endorse a team selling environment, fostering an environment of teamwork, trust, and collaboration with internal and external customers.
Create enthusiasm and positivity for a shared vision and mission, and welcome feedback, adapting behaviors as appropriate.
Attend to the unique and individual shopping needs of each customer, tailoring the approach by reading cues and working with multiple customers simultaneously.
Maintain a calm and professional demeanor at all times, welcome feedback, and adapt behaviors as appropriate.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; college degree preferred.
